OSPF Simulation with Interface Costs
====================================

This simulation demonstrates configuring interface costs in FRRouting through
Munet.

```
                             10.0.2.0/24
     ----------------------------------------------------------
      |                         net2                         |
      |.1                                                  .3|
   +------+                   +------+                   +------+
   |      |    10.0.1.0/24    |      |    10.0.3.0/24    |      |
   |  r1  | ----------------- |  r2  | ----------------- |  r3  |
   |      |.1     net1      .2|      |.2     net3      .3|      |
   +------+                   +------+                   +------+


  \......................... area 0.0.0.0 ......................../
  
```
